meanings.definition: A member of a Bantu-speaking people of southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The Zulus danced around the fire in celebration.
meanings.sent2: I met a friendly Zulus at the market today.
meanings.sent3: The Zulus decided to have a picnic on the moon.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a gathering of Zulus.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the Zulus brightened the dull landscape.

meanings.definition: The language of the Zulus, a Bantu language of southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: Learning Zulus helped me connect with the local community.
meanings.sent2: She spoke Zulus fluently with her family.
meanings.sent3: The parrot in the zoo started squawking in Zulus.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed like a river in Zulus.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sounds of Zulus filled the air during the festival.
